text:
Poisons Amendment Act 2009

An Act to amend the Poisons Act 1971 and to make consequential amendments to the Alcohol and Drug Dependency Act 1968
[Royal Assent 24 June 2009]

Be it enacted by His Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Poisons Amendment Act 2009 .

2. Commencement
    This Act commences on a day to be proclaimed.

3. Effect of certain consequential amendments
    The amendment by this Act of a provision of any regulations made under any Act does not prevent that provision or any other provision of those regulations from being amended or rescinded by any subsequent regulations.

PART 2 - Poisons Act 1971 Amended

4.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Poisons Act 1971 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Poisons Act 1971 .
